title: Angus Taylor says his new frontbench will take the fight to Labor, but his biggest battle is to save the Liberal party
summary_full: Opposition leader picks Tim Wilson as shadow treasurer while rewarding his supporters and elevating some strong performersGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastIt is almost impossible to overstate the challenge facing Angus Taylor just days into the job as opposition leader.Announcing a new frontbench to fight Labor on Tuesday afternoon, his remade shadow ministry lineup is really about fighting for the life of the Liberal party.
